ThePirateBay.title: thepiratebay
ThePirateBay.content1: The Pirate Bay (TPB) is one of the largest torrent sites, millions of visitors per day.
ThePirateBay.content2: The Pirate Bay allows visitors to search, download, and contribute magnet links and torrent files.

Torrentseeker.title: torrentseeker
Torrentseeker.content1: TorrentSeeker is a robust torrent search engine that uses custom Google Search to scrape torrents from over 100 torrent sites.

Torrents.title: torrents
Torrents.content1: This popular meta torrent search engine site is very different from any other BitTorrent-related site you’ll see. While homepages feature extensive lists of torrents, Torrents.me displays search trends for popular queries. These trends keep changing frequently and provide a good idea of what’s hot and what BitTorrent users are looking for.

Itorrents.title: itorrents
Itorrents.content1: iTorrents.org is a free service for caching torrent files online.
Itorrents.content2: You can not search or list torrent files that are stored here, you can only access them if you already know the info_hash value of the torrent you want to download.

Torrentdownload.title: torrentdownload
Torrentdownload.content1: torrentdownload is a website which features various torrent files to download movies, TV series, anime, ebooks, software, music, and so on.

Toorgle.title: toorgle
Toorgle.content1: toorgle is a torrent search engine powered by google.

SETTINGS.DefaultTrackerListHint: Currently, it only supports format like this. If you want to change, please check this url.
SETTINGS.MaxEstablishedConnsHint: Default is 100, you can set it depend on your computer.
SETTINGS.DownloadDirectoryHint: Change of this will lead to restart of all unfinished tasks.
SETTINGS.CacheDirectoryHint: This directory is used to store data generated during running period.
